WhimsyWoods.title: First Light
WhimsyWoods.content: The stars whispered and I listened.

WhimsyWoods.title: Memory Shard
WhimsyWoods.content: There was a moment today I want to keep.

StarSeeker.title: Cosmic Drift
StarSeeker.content: Drifted through a thought like a nebula.

StarSeeker.title: Pulse
StarSeeker.content: A rhythm moved in the silence. I pulsed with it.
